description.value:
Holster for hiding and rapid access of weapon. Only works with Compact Pistol weapons. Common or Good Craftsmanship impose -20 to Awareness, Scrutiny, or Search to discover the stored weapon on the user. Best Craftsmanship allow wielder to draw weapon as a Free Action.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
